segments.text: Your lease isn ’ t up yet .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I won ’ t be able to stay here anymore .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s going to be a problem .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t know why there ’ s a problem .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s a problem because I can ’ t give you your deposit back .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why can ’ t you give it back to me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m going to need my deposit back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s not going to happen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can ’ t stay here , though .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s really not my problem .
segments.speaker: S2
